DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to create teams on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to create teams on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create teams without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read the names and descriptions of teams
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Read the names and  descriptions of teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read the names and descriptions of teams
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Read the names and  descriptions of teams, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Get a list of all teams
Application.adminDescription: Get a list of all teams, without a signed-in user.
